name: Tide Guardians

branding_data.short_description: Defend underwater cities from pollutant missiles as Tide Guardians using old arcane ocean technology.
branding_data.detailed_description: Tide Guardians is a unique twist on the classic 'Missile Command' game set in an aquatic world. Players assume the role of ancient oceanic protectors tasked with defending underwater cities from an onslaught of pollutant-laden missiles threatening marine life. Using arcane technologies inherited from the sea's olden eras, players strategically deploy barriers, counter-missiles, and magical sea creatures to ensure the city's sustainability and balance are maintained. The game promotes awareness about ocean conservation, encouraging players to think about ethical actions and sustainable practices. By drawing on old ideas such as traditional defense mechanics and blending them with creative aquatic elements, 'Tide Guardians' offers an engaging experience suitable for game developers of all skill levels seeking to integrate theme-based strategies from game jams.
